summary: This mod makes the Ebony Mail armor a light armor piece.
descriptionHtml:
This mod aims to make the Ebony Mail armor a light armor regarding weight, armor class and perk/skills effects.

There are a few other mods here try to do the same thing, but I encountered problems with all of them - one didn't trigger the Custom Fit perk, another didn't lower the weight... etc. So I decided to simply make my own.
author: Aepocalypsa
